snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include Jack Dorsey, while pitching his payments start-up, Square, arguing that the receipt is an untapped “canvas” and “publishing medium.” Plus, why the network neutrality ruling on Tuesday could...
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include Jack Dorsey, while pitching his payments start-up, Square, arguing that the receipt is an untapped “canvas” and “publishing medium.” Plus, why the network neutrality ruling on Tuesday could matter to start-ups.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Dorsey on Disrupting Receipts, and Implications of the Net Neutrality Ruling
